title: My Neighborhood
description: In My Neighborhood, students take a tour of a boy's neighborhood and learn about common places located there. Concept of a map is also introduced to students. Patterned text, high-frequency words, and supportive pictures make this book perfect for emerging readers.
meta: bakery, fire station, grocery store, library, neighborhood, streets
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial Blends : Discriminate initial consonant blend /st/
Consonant Blends : Identify initial consonant blend st
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency word my

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
